pycopancore.models.base_only module¶

Base model module.

It only import components of the base mixins

pycopancore.models.exodus module¶

pycopancore.models.exploit module¶

Exploit model.

The exploit model is including the modules base, most_simple_vegetation, simple_extraction and exploit_simple_learning. It is based on the cython implementation cyexploit (see https://github.com/wbarfuss/cyexploit )

class pycopancore.models.exploit.Cell(*, stock=1, capacity=1, growth_rate=1, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: pycopancore.model_components.most_simple_vegetation.implementation.cell.Cell, pycopancore.model_components.simple_extraction.implementation.cell.Cell, pycopancore.model_components.base.implementation.cell.Cell

Class to mix all Cell_mixins to create Cell class.
